description:
Run AI models locally. One-click install w/ zero configuration.


●
Chat Page Improvements
●
Lore Items are now displayed in the sidebar
●
Character, Model, and Chat Settings are now individual overlays on desktop to make editing easier and faster
●
Better spacing for full-width mode
●
Chat messages now only display one empty line between paragraphs
●
Improved spacing for full-width mode on desktop & web
●
Other Improvements
●
Added support for importing chat logs from JSON files on Web & Mobile
●
Added linked external accounts to the Accounts Settings page
●
Discord accounts can now be linked to your Backyard.ai account, regardless of your sign-in method
●
Bug Fixes
●
Due to an issue with the X API, new accounts can no longer be created with X (Twitter). We will still support existing accounts but will phase out the ability to sign in with X in the future
●
Fixed issue where Desktop apps would have UI rendering issues on the chat page
●
Fixed issue where chat dropdown menu was partially obscured on some mobile devices
●
Fixed issue preventing uploading characters to the Hub on some mobile devices
●
Fixed issue where regen buttons would sometimes be hidden after loading older messages
●
Fixed issue where the "Upgrade" button failed to redirect to the subscription management page
●
Fixed issue where copy/system menu was disabled on the chat items on Desktop App & Web
Updates from 1 beta releases included
